name: DEAR Token
description: DEAR Protocol is a decentralized e-commerce marketplace protocol designed to empower developers to build e-commerce platforms based on existing products listed within its network. It facilitates seamless cross-border peer-to-peer trading, reducing fees and commissions for sellers, and enhances transparency and trust in transactions. The protocol's unique DEAR token serves multiple functions, including facilitating transactions, staking, and governance, while also providing a profit-sharing mechanism that rewards token holders whenever the platform distributes profits. DEAR Protocol aims to revolutionize e-commerce by making it more accessible, cost-effective, and globally interconnected.
